data.name: It'sRoachTime!
data.detailed_description:
It'sRoachTime! - is a hardcore, third person 3D online pvp fighting arena game!
* Fight as a mutant cockroach in real time insect simulator, find your way to survive, destroy them all!
* Various themed arenas in the post-Soviet apocalypse.
* Standard weapons are the past, fight with homemade needles, razor blades, paws of birds and insects!
* How you decide to defeat your opponents is entirely up to you. Assault from the front and fight all at once or ambush enemies one at a time!
* Unique cockroach music and sound effects from the "Henry" band.
* Comic Artist's works Sergei Kritzien.
* The apartment is fraught with danger: gas fire, explosions and falls. We add more and more dangerous surprises!
* The game mode "DeathMatch" is completely ready. There will be more in the future!
* Our team is gonna make it better every bloody day even after the release!

data.short_description: It'sRoachTime! - is a hardcore, third person 3D online pvp fighting arena game! Fight as a mutant cockroach in real time insect simulator, find your way to survive, destroy them all!
data.supported_languages:
Russian*, English*, German, Italian, French, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU G530 @2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
